pageSubtitle: 20+ years of engineering leadership in payments, security, and regulated SaaS.
executiveSummary: Technical founder and engineering executive with 20+ years building secure, scalable products in payments, cybersecurity, and regulated SaaS. Former Senior Engineering Manager / Technical Lead at Pagos (US-based fintech), now Co-Founder/CEO of Synvra, a compliance-by-design LIMS and validation platform for ISO 17025 / GLP/GMP / FDA 21 CFR Part 11 labs. Proven track record of taking products from idea to architecture, delivery, and ongoing operations across fintech data platforms, SOAR/endpoint security, and public-sector systems (UNDP/GEF). Strong at aligning engineering with business outcomes: approval rates, churn/retention, cost-to-serve, and audit readiness.
